platformOverview.heroSubtitle: An all-in-one AI-powered legal workspace. Case management, document intelligence, multi-agent investigation, document drafting, team collaboration, and billing — all with multilingual support for the Indian legal market.
platformOverview.whoWeAreTitle: AI-Powered Legal Practice for the Indian Market
platformOverview.whoWeAreDesc: Law Firm Connect helps law firms modernize their practice by combining traditional case management with cutting-edge AI capabilities — enabling lawyers to work faster, smarter, and more collaboratively.
platformOverview.featuresSubtitle: From case creation to AI-powered investigations, we provide a comprehensive suite of tools designed for modern legal practice.

features.caseManagementDesc: 3-step guided case creation, centralized dashboard, activity logging, configurable notifications, and full audit trails across Family Law, Corporate, Real Estate, and Litigation.
features.ragChatDesc: Chat with your case documents using Retrieval-Augmented Generation. Get citation-backed answers with source verification and session management.
features.investigationDesc: 9-step multi-agent pipeline that analyzes documents, extracts entities, audits timelines, validates evidence, and generates comprehensive reports.
features.draftingDesc: Template-based generation for Legal Notices, Contracts, Affidavits, and more. Refine through conversation, with automatic RAG indexing.
features.docManagementDesc: Multi-format upload (PDF, DOCX, images, audio), OCR for scanned documents, audio transcription, bulk ZIP upload, and real-time status tracking.
features.teamCollabDesc: Create and manage your firm, invite members with role-based access, assign lead attorneys, and manage seat-based licensing.
features.messagingDesc: Socket.io-powered instant messaging with threaded conversations, contact management, friend requests, and read receipts.
features.calendarDesc: Day/Week/WorkWeek views with color-coded event types: Meetings, Court Dates, Appointments, Deadlines, and Personal events.
features.billingDesc: Case-level billing, organization dashboard, Razorpay integration, wallet balance tracking, and invoice download/print.
features.multilingualDesc: Full i18n framework with browser detection, Indic script transliteration, virtual keyboard, and multilingual RAG across English and Indian languages.

security.rateLimiting: Rate limiting across all endpoints (chat: 30/min, uploads: 10/min)
security.inputSanitization: Input sanitization (XSS, SQL injection, parameter pollution protection)

security.passwordSecurity: Bcrypt hashing, strength validation, account lockout after 5 failed attempts
security.fileValidation: File validation: 50MB limit, extension whitelist, filename sanitization
security.encryption: HTTPS/SSL encryption for all data in transit
